title: The Middle Tree
description: "Come find me. I'll be waiting..."When tragedy strikes close to home, 19-year-old Zoe Bingham is forced to sacrifice her own wild dreams for the sake of her family. As she struggles to make peace with her compromise and keep her eccentric family united, Zoe meets a mysterious stranger who - in just three days - loosens the roots that ground her. But just as quickly, they are pulled apart by circumstance.Eight years later, Zoe is a talented Hollywood screenwriter. She is forced to work with famous film star Cooper Douglas, who just happens to be the person who changed the course of her life all those years ago. They are pulled back to Beausville where the deadly roots of the Middle Tree, which has haunted the town for generations, are snaking around them once again.
author: L.C. Murray
